turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant, I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I can order from the nearest Starbucks to your location, 14330 Lake City Way NE Seattle, WA 98125. Is this your preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drink can I order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a peppermint mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that Iced or hot peppermint mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This location has short, tall, grande, and venti sizes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. Would you like to choose soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Of course! May I ask how many calories I can expect in this drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 540 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can place on the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just one drink thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink order has been placed at 14330 Lake City Way NE Seattle, WA 98125 location and should be ready for pickup shortly. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via sms txt message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks
